SPECIFICATION
Fg2p
HEXAGON
BO-LTS FOR STEEL
STRUCTURES

I.  Scope -
Requirements for hexagon bolts in the size range 12 to 39 mm for steel structures.

2.  Dimensions
and Tolerances
-
The dimensiorls
of bolts shall be as giuen in Table 1 and
preferred length,
diameter combination
and clamping
lengths for bolts as  given
in Table 2.
The
tolerances shall be as given in Fig. 1.

1

FOR  HEXAGON
BOLTS
FOR STEEL STRUCTURES

to IS  :  1369-1961  ‘  Dimensions
for screw threads run-outs
and undercuts
‘.

Note - Sizes  shown in brackets are of second preference.

FIG. 1 TOLERANCES FOR HEXAGON BOLTS FOR STEEL STRUCTURES

3. Mechanical
Properties
-
The mechanical properties of the bolts shall conform to the ‘property
class 4.6
or 6.6
as specified
in IS  :  1367-1967
’ Technical
supply conditions
for threaded
fasteners ( first revision ) ‘.

4. Grade  -
Black (B) grade according to IS : 1367- 1967.

5. Designation
-
The hexagon bolts shall be designated by the size, length, the number of this
standard and the property class.

A hexagon
bolt of size Ml 2, length 30 mm conforming to this standard and of
property class 4.6 shatl be designated as:
5.1 Where the bolts are required with hexagon nuts (see %3), they shall be designated as:

A hexagon bolt of size M12, length 30 mm and property class 4.6 with a hexagon
nut shall be designated as:

6.1 Sampling
-
The method of sampling
and acceptance criteria is to be in accordance with
IS  :  2614-l
969  ’  Methods for sampling of fasteners ( first  revision
)  l
.

6.2 The hexagon bolts shall comply with the requirements of IS  :  -1367-l 967 in respect of require-
ments not specified in this standard.

5.3 The hexagon nuts used with hexagon bolts shall conform to requirements given in IS : 1363-
.1967 ’ Black hexagon bolts, nuts and lock nuts ( dia 6 to 39 mm ) and black hexagon screws
( dia 6 to 24 mm ) ( firsf  revision
)’  in all respects.

5.4 The bolts shall be supplied in natural finish unless otherwise specifhd by the  purchaser.
At
the request
of  the purchaser they may be galvanizedas
per IS  :  5358-1969
coating on fasteners ‘.
’ Hot-dip galvanized

6.5 The approx!mate weght
of hexagon bolts with nuts has been given in
guidance of the purchaser.
